Package org.apache.spark.network.shuffle

Interface MergedBlocksMetaListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
public interface MergedBlocksMetaListener extends EventListener
Listener for receiving success or failure events when fetching meta of merged blocks.
Since:
3.2.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onFailure(int shuffleId, int shuffleMergeId, int reduceId, Throwable exception)
    Called when there is an exception while fetching the meta of a merged block.
    void
    onSuccess(int shuffleId, int shuffleMergeId, int reduceId, MergedBlockMeta meta)
    Called after successfully receiving the meta of a merged block.

  • Method Details

    • onSuccess

      void onSuccess(int shuffleId, int shuffleMergeId, int reduceId, MergedBlockMeta meta)
      Called after successfully receiving the meta of a merged block.
      Parameters:
      shuffleId - shuffle id.
      shuffleMergeId - shuffleMergeId is used to uniquely identify merging process of shuffle by an indeterminate stage attempt.
      reduceId - reduce id.
      meta - contains meta information of a merged block.

    • onFailure

      void onFailure(int shuffleId, int shuffleMergeId, int reduceId, Throwable exception)
      Called when there is an exception while fetching the meta of a merged block.
      Parameters:
      shuffleId - shuffle id.
      shuffleMergeId - shuffleMergeId is used to uniquely identify merging process of shuffle by an indeterminate stage attempt.
      reduceId - reduce id.
      exception - exception getting chunk counts.
